translations.name: Afrikaans Standard Version
translations.description: A version of the New Testament called the \\\"Afrikaans Standard Version\\\" was published in 2014 as a parallel Bible with the new \\\"Standard\\\" translation and the New Living Translation. It is practically a word-for-word translation, as it is based on the word-for-word Afrikaans text in the interliniar Bible that was published by CUM Books in 2012. One of the editors of the Bible Society's Direct Translation is also an editor of the Afrikaans Standard Version.
